Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Northbound Reroute near Harlem/Ontario
ShortDescription: NB 90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Oak Park, Chicago Avenue, & Harlem: due to street blockage near Harlem/Ontario.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Oak Park, Chicago Avenue, then resume their normal route on Harlem, due to street blockage near Harlem/Ontario.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity near Pulaski. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity near Pulaski.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
